document.full_text: twitter co-founder jack dorsey is returning to the microblogging company to oversee product development, even as one of twitter's other founding members cuts back his involvement, the company said on monday.
document.title: twitter co-founder named executive chairman
lines_and_colors: twitter co-founder jack dorsey is returning to the microblogging company to oversee product development, even as one of twitter's other founding members cuts back his involvement, the company said on monday.
